About

I am a 3rd year student at Ens Paris-Saclay in theoretical computer science. I am currently doing a one year long internship, under the supervision of Benedikt Ahrens at TU Delft in the PL Group.

My main interests are :

  • Type Theory
  • Proof Assistants
  • Functional Programming Languages
  • Categorical Semantics
